attributes.action: Place demands on immigrants similar to those in USA, Oz, NZ and Canada
attributes.additional_details: The UK is the only country in the EU and ROW which lets people enter without a job, housing and financial wherewithal to not be a burden on taxpayers.  This needs to change and the Tory promise of getting out of the EU Human Rights Act, creating our own, needs to be put in place.  All immigrants should have identification which they carry at all times and they should register each year and notify any change of address (done in the USA).8 months. If they abuse our hospitality by breaking any law they must be deported.  Time for MPs to remember who pays their salaries; British taxpayers.
